name: Aid
desc: You aid a nearby ally, helping them to overcome struggles.
effect:
Choose one of the below, then pay the associated cost:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Decrease your _Shift_ by one level this _Turn_. You may not choose this option if you have already moved beyond that distance. Remove _Prone_ from an adjacent ally.
* X _Focus_/_Momentum_ (minimum 2): Choose an adjacent ally. They may immediately use the _Recover_ _Maneuver_, ignoring its normal cost, gaining X-2 _Fleeting_ Tokens of their choice this _Turn_.
* 1 __Momentum_/_Reflex_: Swap spaces with an adjacent ally, adding [_Safe_ 1] to this Movement.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: You may choose two Effects, but must pay both costs.

name: Arcing Shot
desc: You fire your projectile high, giving a foe the chance to respond but increasing your range.
trigger: Ranged Projectile _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Increase the Weapon's Range by 2. Instead of immediately resolving the Attack, create a Size 1 _Hazard_ in the creature's space so long as you have an _Arcing_ path to the Target. At the start of the next _Phase_, after all 'A _Phase_ begins' Reactions (and similar) have resolved, resolve the _Weapon Attack_ [_Arcing_, _Incoming_], then remove the _Hazard_.

name: Armored Blow
desc: You launch an assault, using your armor to push through limitations.
effect: Gain +2 _Guard_ against all _Counters_ used against this _Technique_. Before making this Attack, you may use _Recover_, but may only remove a single _Impaired_ _Token_.

name: Armored Shell
desc: You trust fully in armor, risking damage to better block an attack.
reqs: Must be wearing Light or Heavy Armor that has _Durability_ remaining.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the Triggering Attack, and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. Your _Armor_ loses _Durability_ equal to half the Damage you take, minimum one.

name: Basic Feint
desc: You feint one way before attacking another, providing yourself an advantage.
effect: The Target must pay 1 _Focus_. If they do not, gain a +1 Bonus to the Attack Roll.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, foe must pay 2 _Focus_. If they do not _Negate_, additionally add [_Sure Hit_/_Unblockable_ 1] to the Attack.

name: Basic Flourish
desc: You feint one way before attacking another, providing yourself an advantage.
reqs: You complete a Single-Target Attack against a foe that is still adjacent to you.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_).

name: Basic Counter
desc: You sacrifice your defense and capitalize on an opportunity to attack.
trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy.
effect: You may not _Negate_ the triggering Attack. Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Baiting Flourish
desc: You disengage while making it appear there is an opening, drawing a foe into your trap.
trigger: You _Hit_+ with a Single-Target Attack.
effect: The target must immediately spend 2 _Focus_. If they do not, gain a +1 Bonus on your next Attack Roll against them as a part of a _Counter_/_Punish_ Maneuver. If they do, you instead gain _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Bend the Earth
desc: You are skilled at controlling earth, flinging it about with ease.
cost: 1 _Grit_/_Focus_ (increase the Cost by 1 for each successive use in a _Turn_)
effect: At any point this _Turn_, make two adjacent, unoccupied _Earthen_ spaces _Rough_ or remove an _Earthen_ Terrain effect from them. You may instead add _Climable_ to the sides adjacent to you of two _Earthen_ spaces or _Obstacles_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Focus_: Instead, make _Stairs_ on as many sides as you wish of an adjacent _Earthen_ space.
* 1 _Grit_/_Focus_: You may target occupied spaces. Inflict _Exposed_ 1, _Slide_ 1 (1 _Reflex_), or _Vulnerable_ 1 if they _Negate_.

name: Blade Parry
desc: Your sword cuts apart an incoming strike, potentially opening an avenue to attack.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_]. If you succeed, reduce the Attack Roll by 2. Gain 1 _Guard_ if your _Bladed_ Weapon is _Heavy_.
special: 1 _Momentum_: If the enemy is within _Reach_ and you exceed their Attack Roll, resolve the _Weapon Attack_ as _Glancing_ against the Attacker.

name: Bloodthirsty Soil
desc: You create jagged spines in an instant, just in time to catch an incoming foe.
trigger: A creature is _Forcibly Moved_ in or into Range.
effect: Make an _Earthen_ space the creature is passing through with this _Forced Movement_ _Jagged_.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Grit_: Instead, replace a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range the creature would collide with a _Spire_.
* 2 _Grit_: Instead, create a _Spire_ in an _Earthen_ _Jagged_ space the creature would pass through.

name: Blurring Throw
desc: Your thrown weapons come out at blinding speed, catching slower foes fully off-guard.
effect: Add [_Sure Hit_ 1]. If the Target has not taken a _Turn_ yet this _Round_, deal +2 Damage on a _Hit_+ and instead add [_Sure Hit_ 2].

name: Bounding Feint
desc: You leap through the air, attacking a foe from above.
effect: Before making an Attack, make a _Jump_, adding [_Safe_ 1]. If this _Jump_ moves through the Target's space, the Target must immediately pay 2 _Focus_/_Reflex_. If they do not, gain a +1 _Bonus_ to your Attack Roll.

name: Breakfall
desc: You agilely roll as you fall, directing that dangerous momentum forward.
trigger: You _Fall_.
effect: Treat the distance you _Fall_ as 2 less for the purpose of calculating damage. After you _Fall_, if you take no Damage you may immediately _Roll_ X without expending any Movement, where X is half the distance you fell.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'You complete a _Jump_.' Instead _Roll_ X without expending any Movement, where X is half the distance you _Jumped_.

name: Butterfly Path
desc: You move carefully, ensuring that you leave no openings.
effect: All Attack Rolls against you this _Turn_ take a -1 Penalty. Once this _Turn_, inflict _Insight_ 1 on a creature you move out of adjacency with.

name: Careful Snag
desc: You pluck a projectile from midair, potentially ending the assault instantly.
trigger: You are Attacked by a Ranged _Thrown_ _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Make an _Attack Roll_. If you roll greater than or equal to the incoming _Weapon Attack_, reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 2. Regardless, if the _Weapon Attack_ would _Embed_ do not, and immediately _Wield_ the Weapon in your _Open Hand_.
special:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'You are Attacked by a Ranged Attack'. To use this, the Attack must make use of some sort of physical projectile. 
* 2 _Momentum_ (only usable if you rolled greater than the incoming Attack): Immediately make an Attack with the Weapon against a Target within Range. If you used the previous _Boost_, treat it as a _Small Improvised_ Weapon.

name: Charge Killer
desc: You strike viciously as a foe enters your reach, daring them to continue forward.
trigger: A creature enters your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. Do not immediately deal Damage; instead, after the creature ends their Movement, deal Damage, +1 Damage for each space the creature moved within your _Reach_ after the Attack.

name: Chip Damage
desc: You weaponize broken shards of your armor, using them to strike whoever dared to attack you.
trigger: You are Attacked by an enemy within Range while you have _Stone Armor_.
effect: The Attacker must immediately pay 2 _Reflex_ or take 4 Damage and gain _Wounded_ 1.
special: If your _Stone Armor_ is destroyed, you may use this _Reaction_ for 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ and without using your _Resist_ for the _Turn_.

name: Circular Slash
desc: You whirl your blade around, attacking in a circle all around you.
effect: Instead, _Glancing_ Attack in a _Burst_ 1.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Closing Counter
desc: You close the distance with a foe, pushing every closer.
trigger: You are Attacked
effect: You must end your _Shift_ closer to Triggering Target than you started it.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Make a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_ against the triggering foe, or a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_, adding [_Glancing_].

name: Close-Quarters Throw
desc: You throws do not compromise your defenses, allowing you to easily attack in close-quarters.
effect: Add [_Warding_ 1]. Ignore all penalties due to adjacent foes for this Attack. On a _Miss_, you may inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Compact
desc: You crush nearby earth into a dense boulder, forming it into a deadly weapon.
cost: 1 _Grit_ (increase the Cost by 1 for each successive use in a _Turn_)
target: A Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range with 12 or less _Durability_.
effect: Replace the Obstacle with a _Boulder_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Instead, Target is an unoccupied _Earthen_ space. Create a _Boulder_ in that space.

name: Courageous Charge
desc: You use an allies' courageous charge to lift the spirits of your companions.
trigger: You or an ally within Range is targeted by a _Punish_ _Manuever_ that triggered off of Movement.
effect: Grant the Target _Vigor_ 2. Grant the Target or another ally within Range _Courage_ 2.

name: Covering Spear
desc: You quickly lash out with your spear, interrupting a foe's assault.
trigger: An enemy within your Weapon's _Reach_ Attacks a creature other than you.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against the creature. Impose a _Penalty_ on the Attack Roll based on your Attack: -1 for a _Hit_ or -2 for a _Crit_. The foe may _Negate_ (2 _Focus_) to ignore this _Penalty_.

name: Crash Through
desc: You ram through an obstacle, using brute strength to carry you through.
trigger: You would Move into an _Obstacle_ with [_Rush_] Movement.
effect: Immediately deal (Current _Phase_) + 4 _Damage_ to the _Obstacle_. If you do not destroy the Obstacle with this _Maneuver_, end your Movement.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (when you fail to destroy the Obstacle): Deal an additional 3 Damage. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Crashing Earth
desc: You sacrifice speed to imbue a strike with every ounce of the earth's power.
reqs: Technique is a Strike that makes a _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Add _Stall_.  This Technique's Movement is now _None_. At the start of the _Phase_ you must declare that you are using this _Maneuver_. If you do not Move this _Phase_, you have _Advantage_ on the Attack. Regardless, add [_Pierce_ 2, _Unblockable_ 2] to a _Weapon Attack_ made as a part of this Technique.

name: Create Opening
desc: You launch a quick assault, diverting a foe's attention so an ally can strike.
trigger: An adjacent foe is Attacked.
effect: The foe must pay 1 _Focus_. If they do not, the triggering Attack gains a +1 Bonus.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Trigger is 'A foe within your _Reach_ is Attacked.'

name: Cutting Edge
desc: You make a quick slash with your weapon, chipping away at a foe.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature within your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ but deal no Damage. On a _Graze_+, add _Wounded_ 1 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Deadeye Shot
desc: You take careful aim, exploiting the high ground to take a calculated shot.
trigger: Single-Target Ranged Projectile _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1. If the Target is at a lower _Elevation_ and all _Obstacles_ in the _Attack Line_ have a lower _Total Height_ than you, gain a +1 _Bonus_ and add [_Arcing_].

name: Defensive Slash
desc: Your blade doesn't bite quite as deep, but ensures your future survival.
trigger: Melee Bladed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Reduce the Damage of the Attack by 2. If you still deal Damage, gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_, or 2 on a _Crit_.
special:
If you deal Damage, gain additional bonuses depending on the original Attack's keywords:
* _Light_: Gain 1 _Reflex_.
* _Versatile_: Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_.
* _Heavy_: Gain 1 _Grit_.

name: Deflect
desc: You block an attack, either with a weapon or your armor.
trigger: You take Damage.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the triggering Damage.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Repeat the Effect. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Demolition
desc: With the aid of your hafted weapon 'interacting' with the environment is much simpler.
weapon: Hafted with a _Speed_ less than or equal to the current _Phase_.
effect: Use the _Interact_ Action of an _Obstacle_ within your Weapon's _Reach_. Reduce the _Grit_ cost by X, where X is half the _Speed_ of you Weapon.

name: Destructive Flourish
desc: You smash through a nearby obstacle as you rip your weapon away.
trigger: You complete a Melee Hafted _Weapon Attack_.
weapon: Hafted (same as used for the Attack)
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ against an _Obstacle_ within _Reach_, dealing +1 Damage. If you _Destroy_ it you may make the space _Veiled_.
special: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead of dealing +1 Damage, add [_Siege_].

name: Destructive Wake
desc: You gather strength in your legs, shattering the ground behind you before you charge forth.
trigger: Your _Turn_ begins and you have a valid _Shift_.
effect: Add [_Blitz_] to all Movement this _Turn_. Before beginning your Movement, create a _Cone_ 2 _Area_ of _Rough_ Terrain opposite the direction of your Movement.

name: Dodge
desc: You evade a blow, shifting away as the strike comes in.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1. After fully resolving the effect, you may _Shift_ 1 [_Safe_ 2].
boost: 2 _Reflex_: Repeat the Effect. You may do this twice.

name: Dueling Shield
desc: Your shield comes up in a swift counter, potentially knocking a foe's weapon away.
trigger: You are Attacked by a creature within your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_]. If you succeed, gain 1 + (Shield _Speed_ / 2) _Guard_ and inflict _Push_ 1, _Impaired_ 1/_Disarmed_ (2 _Focus_/_Grit_). You must _Disarm_ a _Weapon_ used as a part of this _Attack_. If you roll lower, only gain 1 _Guard_, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_/_Grit_), and your _Shield_ loses _Durability_ equal to half the Damage you take.
special: If the Target is under the effects of _Raise Guard_, gain a +1 Bonus to your Attack Roll.

name: Drive Deeper
desc: You target an embedded weapon, driving it deeper with your throw.
effect: If you _Embed_ with the _Weapon Attack_ and the creature already has _Embed_, deal 4 _True_ Damage.

name: Driving Force
desc: Just as you can strike from many angles, so to can you launch a foe.
effect: Add _Push_ 1 (Always) on a _Graze_+. Any _Push_ you inflict with this Attack may instead be _Angled Push_.

name: Earthen Aegis
desc: You pull forth a wall of stone, defending at the last moment.
trigger: A creature within Range is Attacked.
effect: Create an _Earth Block_ adjacent to the Target and within Range. Resolve the Attack as if that Obstacle was there from the start. If the Attack would do more damage than the Obstacle's _Durability_, immediately destroy it and replace it with _Rough_ Terrain. If the Attack came from a creature adjacent to the Target (and the Target is willing) inflict _Push_ 1 on the Target, moving them directly from the Attacker, then resolve the Effect. Resolve the Attack as if they were still adjacent to the foe, just with the benefits of the _Obstacle_ being present.
special: At the end of the _Round_ lose all _Charges_ of this _Technique_ and gain an equal amount of _Grit_. If you would gain at least 2 _Grit_ in this way you may gain 2 less to create an _Earth Block_ in an adjacent space.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Grit_: Instead, create an _Earth Pillar_.
* 2 _Momentum_: If the Attacker is within Range 6 of the _Earth Block_ you launch the barricade at them. Remove the _Earth Block_ then make a _Weapon Attack_ against the triggering Attacker with a _Heavy Improvised Weapon_, ignoring all Ranged penalties, then place a space of _Rough Terrain_ adjacent to the Attacker in the direction the Attack came from.

name: Earthen Truth
desc: You extend your senses, attempting to find where the pulse of the earth is strongest.
trigger: A creature ends their _Turn_ in your _Seismic Sense_.
effect: The target must choose their Techniques publicly next _Round_.
special: You may pay this _Cost_ by removing an equivalent amount of _Insight_ on the creature.

name: Engage
desc: You obstruct a foe's movement, making it difficult for them to advance.
trigger: A creature of your Size or smaller moves adjacent to you with Movement without [_Charge_] or [_Leap_].
effect: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_. If they do not, their Movement immediately ends.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature one Size larger or smaller'.

name: Expose Flaw
desc: You use your seismic sense to reveal a flaw in a foe's defenses, opening them to attack.
trigger: An ally Attacks a creature within your _Seismic Sense_.
effect: Add _Pierce_ 1 to the Attack.
special: You may allow your ally treat your topmost _Insight_ Token on the Target as their own. If you do, add [_Unblockable_ X], where X is the value of the _Insight_ Token.

name: Faltering Ground
desc: You send a shockwave to disrupt a foe's footing, forcing them into your attack.
reqs: Single-Target Attack against a creature on _Earthen_ Terrain and within Range.
effect: The Target must pay 1 _Reflex_. If they do not, gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the _Attack Roll_ and add [_Sure Hit_ 1].
boost: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If the creature does not _Negate_ they gain _Prone_ before you make your Attack.

name: Fatal Flaw
desc: You expose a foe's weakness, allowing an ally to unleash a devastating assault.
trigger: An ally Attacks a creature within your _Seismic Sense_ that you have _Insight_ on.
effect: You may allow your ally treat your topmost _Insight_ Token on the Target as their own. If you do, after resolving the Attack inflict _Wounded_ X, where X is the value of the _Insight_ Token.

name: Find the Pulse
desc: You extend your senses, attempting to find where the pulse of the earth is strongest.
trigger: _Refresh_ ends.
effect: Roll 2d6, then assign one to direction and one to distance. Mark the space that distance and direction from you. The space must be _Earthen_; if that is impossible with the given rolls, this _Maneuver_ fails. If you end your _Turn_ in that space this round, immediately gain _Seismic Sense_ in a _Blast_ 4, centered on that space.

name: Floating Feet
desc: You focus on defense, preparing to dodge all incoming strikes.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: All Attack Rolls against you this _Phase_ take a -1 Penalty. Each time you're Attacked, gain _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Flurry of Blows
desc: You sacrifice power for speed, striking with blinding speed.
trigger: You make an Unarmed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Instead, make two Unarmed _Weapon Attacks_ [_Combo_, _Glancing_] using the same Weapon.

name: Forceful Flourish
desc: You whip your hafted weapon around, driving foes backward.
trigger: You complete a Melee Hafted _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 1, 2 Damage (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_) in a _Burst_ 1. If a foe Negates with _Grit_, they are not _Pushed_ but still take Damage. If they Negate with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_.

name: Guard Counter
desc: You attack and defend simultaneously, striking out a foe.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. On a _Graze_ gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack. On a _Hit_+, gain 2 _Guard_. On a _Crit_, gain 3 _Guard_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Guidance
desc: You call out a command, granting an ally insight into a foe.
trigger: A _Turn_ begins.
effect: Choose a creature you have _Insight_ on. For this _Turn_, allies of your choice may use your _Insight_ as if it were their own.

name: Harrying Spear
desc: You focus your spear's strikes less on limiting a foe's movement and more on creating openings.
effect: Inflict no _Hobbled_. Instead, inflict an equal value of _Impaired_.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Instead, inflict _Impaired_ equal to 1 greater than the _Hobbled_, or _Impaired_ 1 on a _Graze_.

name: Head Down
desc: You charge forward, trusting your armor to defend you as you plow through foes.
effect: Increase your first _Shift_ distance by 1 space and add [_Blitz, _Rush_]. Gain 1 _Guard_ against all _Punishes_ this _Turn_.

name: Heavy Flourish
desc: You punctuate your attack with a slam of your armored frame, driving foes back.
trigger: You complete a Single-Target Attack against an adjacent foe.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 1, _Dazed_ 1 (2 _Grit_) on the foe. If you _Push_ the foe, you may _Shift_ 1 into their space.

name: Heavy Rebuke
desc: You slam forward into a foe as they strike, fouling their strike.
reqs: Heavy Armor Worn that has _Durability_ remaining.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Immediately use _Heavy Slam_ against the Attacker, applying the _Guard_ granted from it to the triggering Attack. If you _Push_ or knock the creature _Prone_, deal no Damage to your _Armor_. Otherwise, it loses _Durability_ equal to half the Damage you take.

name: Heavy Guard
desc: You raise your guard temporarily, preparing for an assault.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1. Increase your _Guard_ by 2 against the triggering Attack and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you are _Forcibly Moved_, reduce the distance by 2.

name: Heroic Exchange
desc: You rapidly exchange blows with a foe, inspiring all with your duel.
effect: An adjacent _Marked_ Target must immediately use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike against you, paying no costs. After fully resolving the Attack, make a 2 AP Single-Target Strike against them. If you deal more Damage than your foe, grant an ally within Range 6 _Courage_ 2.
special: At the end of the _Round_ lose all _Charges_ of this _Technique_, then lose an equivalent Value of _Courage_.

name: Heroic Strike
desc: You reward an ally's courage with a surge of strength.
trigger: An ally within Range would clear a _Courage_ Token.
effect:
The Target gains no Tokens from clearing their _Courage_. Instead, resolve the below effect, depending on Value being cleared:
* 1 _Courage_: The Target may make a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, dealing +1 Damage.
* 2 _Courage_: The Target may make a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_, but must add [_Glancing_] but dealing +2 Damage.
* 3 _Courage_: The Target may make a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_, dealing +3 Damage.

The Target may not _Shift_ as a part of this Strike. The Target may choose to treat their Token as a lower value; in that case, they gain Tokens from the remaining Value. (If the Target has _Courage_ 3, they may resolve the _Courage_ 1 effect then gain Tokens as if they cleared _Courage_ 2, for example).

name: Hunter's Eye
desc: You take careful aim at a foe, exploiting all information you have on them.
reqs: Technique makes a Ranged Projectile _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1. Gain a +X Bonus to the first Ranged Projectile _Weapon Attack_, where X is half the creature's topmost _Insight_ Token. Remove the _Insight_ Token without gaining any Tokens after making this attack.
boost: 2 _Focus_: Instead, X is the creature's topmost _Insight_ Token.

name: Impenetrable
desc: Your armor is an impregnable bastion, striking fear into the hearts of foes.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Gain 1 _Guard_ until the end of this _Phase_.

name: Invincible
desc: An ineffective attack crushes the spirit of an attacking foe.
trigger: A creature deals 2 Damage or less to you with a _Strike_.
effect: Inflict _Fear_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on the creature, and reduce your cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Juggling Feint
desc: You feint a throw at one foe before suddenly catching it and flinging it at another foe.
effect: Choose a creature other than the Target within Range. They gain _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_). The Target must pay 2 _Focus_. If they do not, gain a +1 Bonus to the _Attack Roll_.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
effect: Immediately make a _Jump_.

name: Honed Body
desc: You are an adaptable combatant, able to adjust your strikes to deal other types of damage.
trigger: You make an Unarmed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Add [_Pierce_ 1]. You may deal one of _Crush_/_Slash_/_Stab_ Damage with this Attack.

name: Immovable Object
desc: You draw upon the strength of the earth, rendering you immovable for an instant.
trigger: A creature is _Forcibly Moved_ into you.
effect: Treat yourself as an _Obstacle_ instead of a creature when resolving this effect. Inflict _Dazed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on the creature.

name: Lionheart Shield
desc: You become a shining example of courage, leaping in front of an attack that would harm a friend.
trigger: An adjacent ally is Attacked by a creature _Marked_ by you.
effect: Move into the target's space, _Pushing_ them 1. You become the Target of the original Attack. If this was an Area attack resolve the Attack as [_Glancing_] against your ally if they are _Pushed_ out of the Area. If you are not _Defeated_ after this Attack gain _Courage_ 1, then grant your ally _Courage_ 1.
special: You may pay any amount of the Cost or Boost by removing an equivalent Value of _Courage_, using any Tokens.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'An ally within _Step_ distance is Attacked.'
* 1 _Grit_: You may _Push_ your ally an additional 2.

name: Lunging Strike
desc: You slide your grip back on your spear, extending your reach.
effect: Increase your Weapon's _Reach_ by 1 this _Turn_. Deal additional Damage equal to half the distance between you and the Target.
special: You may gain _Vulnerable_ 2 to instead increase your _Reach_ by 2.

name: Flitter
desc: You slide out of the way of an incoming attack with practiced ease.
trigger: You are targeted with a _Punish_ Maneuver.
effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1 as well as the _Reflex_ cost to _Negate_.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Repeat the effect. You may repeat this _Boost_ up to 3 times, for a total of -4 to the Attack Roll.

name: Fortify Heart
desc: You seize an ally's heart, warding it from harm.
trigger: An ally within Range gains _Fear_.
effect: Reduce the _Fear_ value by 1, starting with the smallest Token.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Repeat the effect. You may repeat this _Boost_ as many times as you wish.

name: Grasshopper's Leap
desc: You hop quickly, darting like the namesake of this discipline.
effect: Immediately make a _Jump_, treating your _Jump Value_ as 1 higher.

name: Grim Defiance
desc: You harden your resolve, weathering an attack and encouraging your allies.
trigger: You take Damage.
effect:
Choose one:
* Gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack and grant an ally within Range _Courage_ 1.
* Grant an ally within Range _Vigor_ 2, _Courage_ 2.

If you have no _Endurance_, resolve both effects.
special: You may pay the Cost of this _Maneuver_ by removing the appropriate value of _Courage_.

name: Herculean Throw
desc: With titanic strength you redecorate with deadly intent.
effect: You must Target a Size 1 _Obstacle_. Move the Obstacle up to 4 spaces, then make a _Weapon Attack_ with a _Heavy Improvised Weapon_ against a creature next to the Obstacle's final location. Draw the _Attack Line_ from your location to the target. Inflict _Fragile_ on the _Obstacle_. If you deal _Damage_ greater than the _Obstacle's_ _Durability_, destroy it.
special: If the Target is at a lower _Elevation_ than you you have _Advantage_ on this Attack.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, Attack in a Burst 1 around the end location of the Obstacle and _Destroy_ it.

name: Heroic Stand
desc: You fill an ally in a dire spot with courage to keep them in the battle.
trigger: An ally within Range takes Damage.
effect: The ally may remove any value of _Courage_ to spend as _Grit_/_Focus_ against the triggering Attack, either as a _Resist_ or to _Negate_. Grant the ally _Courage_ 1 after the Attack resolves.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, grant _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 2 after the Attack.

name: Impenetrable Stone
desc: Your barricades are unbreakable, defending all those nearby.
trigger: You or an ally within Range is Attacked and is _Covered_/_Obstructed_ by an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_.
effect: The target gains 2 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Trigger is instead 'An Attack passes a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle in Range.' Move the _Earthen_ Obstacle 1 space, then resolve the Effect. This _Obstacle_ may not move into a space that is occupied.

name: Interposing Shield
desc: You pluck an attack from the air, causing it to strike your shield.
trigger: A Ranged Attack passes through a space within your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: You become the target of the Attack. Immediately use _Shield Block_ at no cost against this Attack.

name: Grim Diquid Earth
desc: You run forward, turning earth to fluid as you dart through it.
effect: This _Turn_ you may ignore all effects of _Earthen_ Terrain. Additionally, you may move through _Earthen_ _Obstacles_, but treat them as _Rough_ Terrain. You may not end your turn inside an _Obstacle_. Finally, all _Earthen_ _Obstacles_ and _Terrain_ are _Climable_ for you.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: You may move through all _Obstacles_ on _Earthen_ Terrain, but still treat them as _Rough_. While moving on _Earthen_ Terrain, add [_Safe_ 2].

name: Localized Tremor
desc: You cause the earth around you to quake violently.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Create a Quake in a _Burst_ 1 around you until the end of the _Phase_ that moves with you. Creatures treat _Earthen_ spaces in the Quake as _Rough_, and all Attacks targeting a creature on _Earthen_ spaces in the Quake gain [_Sure Hit_ 1].
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Focus_/_Momentum_: If you are in _Quaking Earth Stance_, increase the size of the Quake to a _Burst_ 2 until the end of the _Phase_.

name: Mighty Leap
desc: You draw upon the earth's strength, using it to launch yourself into the sky.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 2 for your next _Jump_ this Turn. You may make the space you start your _Jump_ from _Veiled_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Jump_ by an additional 1. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Mobile Fortress
desc: You focus your attention on your barricade, sending it sliding about the battlefield.
cost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (increase the Cost by 1 for each successive use in a _Turn_)
effect: Choose a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range 6. Move the Obstacle up to 4 spaces in a straight line. If you move it into a creature, stop this Movement, but inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 1 (1 Grit/Reflex).
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Use the Obstacle's _Interact_ after moving it, with a 2 _Grit_ discount.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to Negate by 1. If you move the Obstacle into a creature, inflict X Crush Damage, where X is the current _Phase_. If they _Negate_, they take half Damage.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on the opening created by a repositioning foe, moving to strike while you can.
trigger: An enemy starts a _Shift_ while within your _Reach_.
effect: Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_. You must use a Technique with a _Reach_ capable of attacking the Target.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_.

name: Overpower
desc: Your weapon is heavy, crashing through the feeble defenses of a foe.
trigger: An enemy starts a _Shift_ while within your _Reach_.
effect: The Target must pay 2 _Reflex_ or 3 _Grit_. If they do not, gain a +1 Bonus to the Attack Roll and add _Prone_ on a _Hit_+.

name: Mighty Flourish
desc: Your attacks carry a heavy weight, punishing those that dare to block.
trigger: You complete a _Weapon Attack_ and the opponent used a _Block_ _Maneuver_.
effect: Deal 2 Damage, then inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 3 (1 _Focus_).

name: Measured Guard
desc: You defend yourself with a narrow margin, learning more of your foe as you do so.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Use the _Deflect_/_Dodge_ _Defend_ with a reduced Cost of 1. Inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (2 _Focus_/_Momentum_) on the foe. If you take no Damage, instead inflict _Knowledge_ 2 (3 _Focus_/_Momentum_).

name: Palm Throw
desc: With a flick of your wrist you fling a weapon, catching foes unaware.
trigger: A _Phase_ Begins.
effect: Make a Ranged _Thrown_ _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_, _Sure Hit_ 1].
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_].

name: Passing Flourish
desc: You dart forward after striking with your blade, allowing your momentum to carry you forward.
trigger: You make a Single-Target Melee Bladed _Weapon Attack_ and have Movement remaining.
effect: Add [_Blitz_, _Rush_, _Safe_ 1] to the remainder of your Movement. You must continue your _Shift_ in the direction you were going when you made the Attack.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Increase your remaining _Movement_ by 2.

name: Patient Arts
desc: Your unarmed strikes are slow and calculating, revealing a foe's openings.
reqs: Technique allows you to make an Attack with a _Martial Arts_ Weapon.
effect: _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Martial Arts_ Weapons treat their _Speed_ as 1 higher. _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Martial Arts_ _Weapon Attacks_ add _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Graze_+ (even if the Attack is [_Parrying_]) and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Add [_Unblockable_ 1] to _Heavy_ _Martial Arts_ _Weapon Attacks_.

name: Patient Guard
desc: You attempt to intercept a foe's assault, creating a slight opening in the process.
trigger: You are Attacked by a target within your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_]. If you succeed, reduce the Attack Roll by 1 and inflict _Exposed_ 1 (Always), or _Exposed_ 2 (Always) if you exceed their _Attack Roll_ by 3+.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Resolve the Attack against the Target.

name: Piercing Point
desc: Your spear is a driving force, carrying through all in its path.
effect: Also resolve the _Weapon Attack_ as [_Glancing_] against all creatures of your choice in the _Attack Line_.
special: If you are in _Stabbing Quill Stance_ you may remove [_Glancing_] against a single Target.

name: Plate Lock
desc: You condense the plates of your armor as you're struck, momentarily heightening your defenses.
trigger: You take Damage while you have _Stone Armor_.
effect: Gain _Slowed_. Increase your _Guard_ by 2 against the Attack, reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 2, and reduce any _Forced Movement_ by 2. Your _Stone Armor_ takes the full Damage you do instead of half.

name: Poising Flourish
desc: You shift your stance as you finish an attack, opening new possibilities.
trigger: You _Hit_+ with a Unarmed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: You may change one of your _Stances_.
boost: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Clear _Staggered_ before changing a _Stance_.

name: Power Through
desc: You take your attack *through* a nearby obstacle before slamming it into a foe.
weapon: Hafted (same as used for the Attack)
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ against an _Obstacle_ adjacent to the Target and within your _Reach_ first. If you _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_ the Target must Negate with 2 _Reflex_ or else you gain a +2 Bonus on the _Weapon Attack_ against the Target.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Add [_Siege_] to the attack against the _Obstacle_.

name: Predictive Waves
desc: You read a foe's movements, preparing a deadly counter.
trigger: A creature starts their _Turn_ within your _Seismic Sense_ or enters it.
effect: Immediately create a _Cone_ 3 _Area_, with the start of the _Cone_ in the Target's space. If they end their turn in an _Earthen_ space in the _Area_, inflict _Insight_ 1, _Exposed_ 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_ (paid when the Target provokes a _Punish_ Maneuver): The _Punish_ Maneuver gains a +1 _Bonus_ on the first _Attack Roll_ made as a part of the _Punish_.
* 2 _Focus_: Instead, _Area_ is _Blast_ 3. Center it on the Target.

name: Punishing Bash
desc: You lash out with your shield, forcing a foe to keep their attention on you.
trigger: A creature within your Weapon's _Reach_ attacks a creature other than you.
effect: Use _Shield Bash_ on the Triggering creature. Apply any _Status_ from this Attack before resolving the triggering Attack.
special: If the creature is _Marked_ by you gain a +1 Bonus to the Attack Roll.

name: Read the Pulse
desc: You feel the subtle shifts of a foe, learning their intent.
trigger: You create _Seismic Sense_ in an occupied space.
effect: Gain _Insight_ 1 on the creature in that space. The GM must tell you the _Phase_ of that creature's next _Technique_.

name: Recover
desc: You use your grit, reflex, and focus to push through hindrances.
trigger: Your _Turn_ ends.
effect: Expend any amount of _Grit_, _Reflex_, and _Focus_, then remove Afflictions/Statuses of your choice according to their listed Recovery rules.

name: Reverberations
desc: Attacks create vibrations, ones that you use to glean more information.
trigger: A foe is _Hit_+ or knocked _Prone_ within your _Seismic Sense_.
effect: Inflict _Insight_ 1 on the creature. If the foe is knocked _Prone_ or _Defeated_ as a part of the Trigger, instead either inflict _Insight_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1 around the Target, or _Insight_ 2 on the Target.

name: Root Breaker
desc: You focus your attack on a foe's stance, attempting to disrupt it with your strike.
effect: After resolving the Attack, inflict _Staggered_ (X _Focus_/_Momentum_), where X is 1/2/3 on a _Graze_/_Hit_/_Crit_. If the original Attack was [_Glancing_], reduce this Cost by 1.
boost: 2 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and add _Prone_.

name: Quick Arts
desc: Your unarmed attacks come forth at blinding speed, striking before foes have the chance to react.
reqs: Technique allows you to make an Attack with a _Martial Arts_ Weapon.
effect: _Light_/_Versatile_ _Martial Arts_ Weapons treat their _Speed_ as 1 lower. Add [_Sure Hit_ 1] to _Light_ _Martial Arts_ _Weapon Attacks_.

name: Quicken
desc: You sacrifice the efficacy of a technique for speed.
effect: Decrease the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1.
special: _Versatile_ Techniques take a -1 penalty to all Attack Rolls made as a part of this Technique. If this Technique makes no Attacks, instead reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Ignore the penalty for _Versatile_ Techniques. _
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add [_Sure Hit_ 1].

name: Rebound
desc: An attack harmlessly bounces off your armor, knocking a foe backwards.
trigger: A creature deals 0 Damage to you with a Melee _Strike_.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 1 (1 _Momentum_).
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Also inflict _Exposed_ 1, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Redirect Force
desc: You guide a foe's attack away from you, minimizing its impact.
trigger: You are Attacked by a Single-Target Attack.
effect: Make a Weapon Attack [_Parrying_]. On a success, gain 2 _Guard_ and reduce the _Grit_/_Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you exceed the Attack Roll by 3+, instead gain 3 _Guard_ and reduce the _Grit_/_Reflex_ cost to _Negate_ by 2
boost: 1 _Momentum_: If you succeed, resolve the triggering Attack as [_Glancing_] against a creature adjacent to you.

name: Redirecting Flourish
desc: You hook a foe with your attack, drawing them where you want and attracting their attention.
trigger: You _Hit_+ with an Unarmed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Add _Pull_ 1, _Marked_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: You may _Shift_ 1 [_Safe_ 1] before resolving the Status inflicted by this Attack.

name: Safe Shot
desc: You are an expert at firing your weapon in close range and can always find the perfect angle.
effect: All creatures adjacent to you must pay 1 _Focus_/_Reflex_. If they do not, you may ignore them when determining any penalties to your _Weapon Attack_ due to adjacent creatures.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. 
* 1 _Momentum_:  Add [_Warding_ 2] to the Attack, and reduce your _Artillery_ value by 1.

name: Sacrificial Shield
desc: You haphazardously throw up your shield, risking your shield to defend.
trigger: You take Damage.
effect: Gain 3 _Guard_ against the triggering Damage. Your _Shield_ loses _Durability_ equal to the Damage you take, minimum 2. If this _Damages_ your _Shield_, gain _Impaired_ 1.

name: Seismic Scouting
desc: You almost passively acquire knowledge on foes, creating an easy path to defeat them.
effect: _Scout_ a creature in your _Seismic Sense_. If they have 0 of any _Token_, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Sentry's Throw
desc: You swiftly fling a weapon at a creature who takes a hostile action within range.
trigger: A creature within Range Attacks an ally.
effect: The Target chooses: Either they reduce their _Attack Roll_ by 2 and you make a single Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against them, or they resolve their Attack with no penalty and you make a single Ranged _Weapon Attack_ against them.
special: At the end of the _Round_ lose all _Charges_ of this _Technique_ and gain an equal amount of _Momentum_.

name: Seismic Aim
desc: You use the earth's senses to aim an assault, seeking the holes in a foe's defenses.
reqs: You are on _Earthen_ Terrain and this is a Single-Target Attack against a creature on _Earthen_ Terrain.
effect: Treat the foe as in your _Seismic Sense_ this _Turn_.
special: If the foe is already within your _Seismic Sense_ instead gain a +1 _Bonus_.

name: Shield Block
desc: You block with your shield, providing an unparalled defense.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Increase your _Guard_ by 1, reduce the _Grit_ cost to Negate by 1, and reduce the Attack Roll by 1 if _Melee_ or 2 if _Ranged_. Your _Shield_ loses _Durability_ equal to half the Damage you take, minimum 1.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Increase your _Guard_ by 1 more. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Shield Parry
desc: You aggressively block an incoming strike, knocking it aside with a vicious shield strike.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_]. If you succeed, gain 1 + Shield _Speed_ / 2 _Guard_. If you roll lower, only gain 1 _Guard_ and your _Shield_ loses _Durability_ equal to half the Damage you take.
special: 1 _Momentum_: Resolve the _Weapon Attack_ as [_Glancing_].

name: Shrug Off
desc: Rather than dodging, you rely on your heavy armor to stop all ills.
reqs: Heavy Armor Worn that has _Durability_ remaining.
trigger: You would gain a Standard or Elemental _Affliction_.
effect: Reduce the _Durability_ of your _Armor_ by the Value of the Token, but _Negate_ it.

name: Snap Shot
desc: You are capable of using your bow at a moment's notice, firing at the slightest opening.
trigger: An enemy starts a Shift while within 3 spaces of you.
effect: Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ against the triggering creature.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Treat your _Artillery_ value as 1 lower. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Striking Quill
desc: As a foe enters the reach of your spear you reinforce how foolhardy an idea that is.
trigger: A creature enters your Weapon's _Reach_.
effect: The creature must either lose 2 spaces of Movement, or allow you to make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ against them.

name: Sudden Curl
desc: You suddenly roll, placing yourself in a more advantageous position.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are not _Prone_.
effect: _Roll_ for this Movement.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'A _Turn_ begins'.

name: True Grit
desc: You push an ally beyond their limits, filling their heart with images of true heroism.
trigger: You or an ally within Range loses all _Endurance_ but still has _Health_ remaining.
effect: Remove all of the Target's _Courage_. They immediately gain _Endurance_ equal to that value + 3. Then, grant them _Courage_ 1. This _Maneuver_ may only target a creature once per combat.

name: Tumbling Evade
desc: You duck out of the way of an incoming blast, avoiding with uncanny ease.
trigger: A _Hazard_ you are in would trigger while you are not _Prone_.
effect: _Shift_ before resolving the _Hazard_. This Movement is _Rolling_.
boost: 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'You are Targeted by an _Area_ Effect.' _Shift_ before resolving the Effect. This Movement is _Rolling_. Still resolve the Triggering Attack but, if you are no longer in the _Area_, add _Glancing_.

name: Rending Slash
desc: A specialized blade technique that tears through unarmored flesh.
effect: If the Target has no _Guard_ either deal +3 Damage or inflict _Wounded_ 1x3.

name: Reorient
desc: You swiftly move, adjusting your footing before taking a more serious action.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins while you are not _Prone_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add [_Safe_ 1].

name: Retrieve
desc: You grab an unattended item.
effect: _Equip_ or _Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) a single unattended, adjacent piece of _Equipment_. Before _Wielding_ an item, you may choose to stop _Wielding_ _Equipment_ of your choice, placing them unattended in your current or adjacent spaces.

name: Rising Spines
desc: You pull jagged lines of earth upwards, creating a deadly trap for foes.
cost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (increase the Cost by 1 for each successive use in a _Turn_)
effect: At any point this _Turn_, make two adjacent, unoccupied spaces _Jagged_.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You may target occupied spaces. Deal 2 Damage and inflict _Wounded_ 1 (1 _Reflex_), or 1 Damage if they Negate.

name: Rollout
desc: You swiftly move a boulder into a creature, slamming them backwards with force.
trigger: A creature enters a space adjacent to a _Boulder_ within Range 6.
effect: Immediately use the 2 _Grit_ _Interact_ of the _Boulder_ against the Target at no Cost.

name: Sapping Flourish
desc: You rip your weapon away massive force, tearing away a foe's defenses as well.
trigger: You _Hit_+ with a Melee Hafted _Weapon Attack_.
effect: You may force the Target to discard 1 _Defensive Token_ of your choice. On a Crit, they instead discard 2. If they do not have sufficient _Defensive Tokens_ of that Type, you may choose a different. If they have no _Defensive Tokens_, they instead discard _Momentum_. If they have no _Momentum_, they instead take Damage equal to twice the Tokens they did not discard.

name: Siege Stone
desc: You propel a heavy stone forward, potentially crushing a foe.
effect: You may use one of the _Boulder_'s _Interacts_ at a 2 _Grit_ discount. You may _Push_ the _Boulder_ an additional 3 spaces when used in this way. If you do not use an _Interact_, you may move the _Boulder_ 3 spaces.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Instead, remove the _Boulder_ from the map and create a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within 6 spaces of it. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove that _Hazard_ and place the _Boulder_ in the center of it. Deal Damage and inflict Status on all creatures in the _Area_ as if you used the 4 _Grit_ _Interact_.

name: Skipping Throw
desc: You ricochet your thrown weapons off the ground or an obstacle, finding a new avenue for attack.
weapon: _Thrown_ (same as used for the original _Weapon Attack_)
effect: Add [_Sure Hit_ 1] to the original Attack. Increase the Range by 3 or choose an _Obstacle_ within Range that would not be _Covered_. Make a Ranged _Thrown_ _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against a creature within Range 3 of that Obstacle. Treat the Obstacle as the origin of the Attack for the _Attack Line_, but the new _Attack Line_ may not pass through the Obstacle used for this effect.

name: Splattering Flourish
desc: You violently whip your blade away, spraying viscera as you do so.
trigger: You inflict _Wounded_ with a Melee Bladed _Weapon_ Attack.
effect: Inflict _Impaired_/_Exposed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) on a creature within Range other than the original Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Blinded_ (2 _Reflex_) until the end of their next _Turn_.

name: Sundering Strike
desc: You tear your weapon through a foe, chipping away at their armor.
effect: Resolve the Attack as [_Glancing_] against the creature's _Armor_.

name: Stoneclad
desc: You rip stones from the earth, coating your weapon for additional effect.
effect: Add [_Unblockable_ 1]. This Attack may instead deal _Crush_ Damage and deals an additional 2 Damage on a _Graze_+.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. On a _Graze_+, add _Dazed_ 1, _Slowed_.

name: Strengthen
desc: You sacrifice the speed of a technique for effect.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1.
special: _Heavy_ Techniques gain a +1 bonus to all Attack Rolls made as a part of this Technique. If this Technique makes no Attacks, instead increase the cost to Negate by 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: _Versatile_ Techniques also benefit from the Special.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Add [_Unblockable_ 1].

name: Swift Bound
desc: You nimbly dart about, covering ground at every opportunity.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: You may _Jump_ once as a part of this Movement. This _Boost_ has no Cost if you are in _Darting Grasshopper Stance_.
* 1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'A _Turn_ starts.'

name: Swift Masonry
desc: You quickly construct an obstacle, pulling the earth upwards.
cost: 2 _Grit_ (increase the Cost by 1 for each repeated use in a _Turn_)
effect: Create an _Earth Block_ in an unoccupied space within Range.

name: Swift Slashes
desc: Your blade is a flash, striking twice in an instant.
effect: Instead, make two _Weapon Attack_ [_Combo_, _Glancing_].

name: Swift Sting
desc: You counter with lightning speed, striking fast but with a bit less force.
reqs: Light Armor Worn, Technique is _Light_ and being used as a part of a _Counter_/_Punish_.
effect: Decrease the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1, but deal 1 less Damage.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may use this Technique with _Versatile_ _Techniques_.
* 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may use this Technique with _Heavy_ _Techniques_.

name: Swift Volley
desc: You quickly fire off a single shot with the intent to force a foe to move.
trigger: A hostile creature's _Turn_ begins that you have an _Arcing_ path to.
effect: Create a Size 1 _Hazard_ in the triggering creature's space. At the end of the creature's _Turn_ make a Ranged_Weapon Attack_ [_Arcing_, _Glancing_, _Incoming_] against all creatures in the _Hazard_, then remove the _Hazard_.

name: Titan's Grasp
desc: You use your amplified strength to grasp a foe in a crushing grip.
effect: If you would _Grapple_, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you successfully inflict _Grappled_, deal 2 _True_ Damage.

name: Tumble
reqs: Must be wearing No or Light Armor.
effect: _Roll_ up to your _Step_ distance.

name: Unstoppable Momentum
trigger: You end a _Shift_ [_Rush_] next to a creature.
effect: Inflict _Push_ 2, _Dazed_ 1 (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_) on the creature.

name: Use Environment
desc: The environment is frequently its own weapon and opens many avenues of attack.
effect: Use the _Interact_ Action of an adjacent _Obstacle_.

name: Valiant Charge
desc: You urge an ally to charge, allowing them to close in on a foe.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Choose an ally with _Courage_ within _Range_. They may immediately _Reposition_ _Shift_, but must end this _Shift_ closer to foes than they started it. If they end this _Shift_ next to a foe, they may remove a _Courage_ as if it was the end of their _Turn_.

name: Vicious Counter
desc: You lash out brutally, punishing a foe and drawing their attention.
trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy.
effect: You may not Negate the triggering Attack. Attack the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target Strike, paying all Costs as normal. On a _Graze_+ inflict _Impaired_ 1, _Marked_ (2 _Focus_). The creature is _Marked_ until the end of their next _Turn_. If the creature _Negates_, you gain _Exposed_ 1.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target Strike.

name: Vicious Draw
desc: You viciously draw an embedded weapon from a foe, wounding them in the process.
effect: Choose an adjacent creature in Range with a _Thrown_ Weapon _Embedded_. That creature must _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_. If they do not, resolve a _Weapon Attack_ with that Weapon as if you rolled a 7. End the _Embed_ and either _Equip_ or _Wield_ (if you have an _Open Hand_) the Weapon.

name: Vigilant Defender
desc: You cover an aly with your shield, protecting them from harm.
trigger: An ally within your Weapon's _Reach_ is attacked.
effect: Use an Maneuver with 'Weapon: Shield', paying all _Costs_ as normal but granting your ally all effects. Any bonuses to the Maneuver granted by your _Stance_ or _Techniques_ you have used apply.

name: Vicious Rend
desc: You attack savagely, rapidly striking your foe with savage efficiency and leaving them reeling.
trigger: You make an Unarmed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: On a _Graze_+, deal +1 Damage. On a _Hit_+, after resolving the Attack, you may convert up to two of the creature's _Vulnerable_ to _Wounded_.

name: Victory Cry
desc: You rouse your allies' spirits as a foe falls before your might.
trigger: An enemy within Range is _Defeated_.
effect: Gain _Courage_ 1, then grant _Courage_ 2 to yourself or an ally within Range.

name: Waiting Hunter
desc: You forfeit the chance to guard to instead find a hole in your foes' defenses.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: Inflict _Insight_ 1 on a _Graze_-, _Insight_ 2 on a _Hit_, or _Insight_ 3 on a _Crit_.

name: Warding Flourish
desc: You finish an attack by adjusting your blade into a defensive posture.
trigger: You complete a Melee Bladed _Weapon Attack_.
effect: Gain a +1 on your next Bladed _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_] against a Target of the triggering _Weapon Attack_ before the end of the _Round_.

name: Whirling Counter
desc: You spin away from an attack, using the momentum to propel you into another attack.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: You may not Negate the triggering Attack. _Shift_ before resolving the rest of this Effect. Attack a creature other than the triggering enemy with a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_, paying all Costs as normal.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Reflex_: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1.
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_.

name: Wide Guard
desc: Your shield protects all nearby, warding against all harm.
trigger: You or an adjacent ally are hit with an _Area_ Attack.
effect: Use the _Shield Block_ Reaction for no Cost, granting the benefits to you and all adjacent allies. Instead of your Shield taking Damage from each Attack, it instead takes the highest Damage dealt.
boost:
1 _Grit_: Gain a benefit depending on the Area of the Triggering attack.
* _Line_: The Attack gains _Glancing_ for all targets in spaces past your own.
* _Cone_, _Blast_, or _Burst_: This Attack is [_Glancing_] against allies in the adjacent spaces opposite the origin of the Attack.
